document_data.caption: A fancy bowl of split pea soup.
document_data.name: Pea Soup
document_data.mainbody: '''Pea soup''' was a rustic [[Faer√ªn]]ian soup named for its prominence of [[pea]]s or [[split pea]]s. It was a common staple for travelers in much wilder lands.{{Cite dragon/277/The New Adventures of Volo: Dragonwing Stew|93}}
document_data.Description: Pea soup was a thick soup that resembled [[gruel]], a dish commonly eaten aboard sailing vessels. It originated from the [[Dalelands]] and the recipe included mashed peas, [[smoked ham]], and [[pepper]].
document_data.Availability: *[[The Painted Boat]], a restaurant in the [[Dragon Reach]] off the southern edge of the [[Ravens Bluff/Harbor District|Harbor District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]], offered patrons pea soup among its menu of soup options at a price of 2 [[copper piece]]s.{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|17}}
